attributes.background:
I think as brexit is being delayed and dithered about this needs to be done.
An independant enquiry into mps personal finances to discover if there are any conflicts of interest that are influencing there decisions about brexit.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. MPs financial interests are already published at 

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/standards-and-financial-interests/parliamentary-commissioner-for-standards/registers-of-interests/register-of-members-financial-interests/
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
